title: Are Cycling’s Mega Contracts Worth It? Crunch Time for Ayuso, Onley and Bike Racing’s ‘Galácticos’
content:
Pressure is on this week as a wave of riders who signed mega deals put rubber to the road to open 2026 in cycling's new 'galácticos' era.

Read the full article at Are Cycling’s Mega Contracts Worth It? Crunch Time for Ayuso, Onley and Bike Racing’s ‘Galácticos’ on Velo.
author: ahood
